document.full_text: monday morning skate: the devils kick off their search for a new coach; tampa bay goes all in blocking shots; boston's power play and use of tyler seguin come into question.
document.title: monday morning skate: devils' candidates, seguin vies for icetime, tampa's block party
lines_and_colors: monday morning skate: the devils kick off their search for a new coach; tampa bay goes all in blocking shots; boston's power play and use of tyler seguin come into question.
